version_description:
- It is now possible to plot polar and parametric functions in the Functions application.
- Matrix computations are now exact.
- It is now possible to define a third sequence in the Sequences application.
- The following probability distributions have been added: chi-squared, Student and geometric.

- It is now possible to plot polar and parametric functions in the Functions application.
- Matrix computations are now exact.
- It is now possible to define a third sequence in the Sequences application.
- The following probability distributions have been added: chi-squared, Student and geometric.

- Additional results in the Calculation application
- Units in the Calculation application
- New Python modules
- Ability to copy and paste a selection

- Additional results in the Calculation application
- Units in the Calculation application
- New Python modules (matplotlib, ion, time)
- Ability to copy and paste a selection

- Autocompletion in the Python editor
- Improvement of Python's turtle and matplotlib modules
- Display results on the same line as the entries
- New additional results for results containing units

New automatic adjustment of the graphing window
Added Imperial units
New section in the Toolbox for Vectors

New automatic adjustment of the graphing window
Added Imperial units
New section in the Toolbox for Vectors

- The Toolbox menu has been reorganized and the browsing history is now indicated in a banner at the top of the Toolbox.
- The Navigate menu now allows the graph to be displayed in full screen.
- Improvement of the solution search algorithm in the Equations and Functions applications.
- Exact resolution of cubic equations in the Equations app.
